title: Business Analyst, Pune
description:
Role: Business Analyst

Responsibilities


Gathering critical information from meetings with various stakeholders (Customers and Partners).
Evaluating business processes, anticipating requirements, uncovering areas for improvement, and implementing solutions.
Conducting meetings and presentations to share ideas and findings.
Working on Partnership management.
Effectively communicating your insights and plans to cross-functional team members and management.
Prioritizing initiatives based on business needs and requirements.
Monitoring deliverables and ensuring timely completion of projects.
Working on BRDs, FRDs and RFPs
Gathering raw data & processing it based on requirements.


Business Analyst Skills Requirements


Exceptional analytical and conceptual thinking skills.
The ability to influence stakeholders and work closely with them to determine acceptable solutions.
Advanced technical skills. (Power BI, Tableau, Excel & Google Script)
Experience creating detailed reports and giving presentations.
A track record of following through on commitments.
Excellent planning, organizational, and time management skills.
Having knowledge of Business Documents


Educational Qualification

BE / BTech

Preferred Candidate Profile

An Ideal candidate is a BE / Btech with 1-3 yrs of exp in Business Analyst role, preferably product testing, based out of Pune and an early joiner

Perks and benefits: PF, Insurance, PL etc
